name: Summoning: Paper Bird
summary: Creates a small paper bird that delivers messages or small items and can scout short distances.
technique: Fold and infuse paper with a simple summoning seal.
Imbue a guiding pulse of chakra to steer the bird.
Recall with a short command or let it land and wait.
training: Mini-delivery drills: land within a 1m circle.
Stealth movement to avoid detection when scouting.
tips: Excellent for discreet messaging; weak in rain.
Can be combined with ink seals to carry tiny traps or markers.

markdown.text: A lightweight summoning used for reconnaissance and small deliveries. Useful for scouts and couriers.

name: Memory Bind Seal
summary: A sealing technique that temporarily locks a short memory fragment for later retrieval by the caster.
technique: Trace a small circular seal around the target memory point (often performed on a token).
Anchor the seal with a short breath and a focused intent phrase.
Keep the token secure; retrieval requires the original caster's chakra signature.
training: Focus drills: recall small details then seal them.
Token management: protect and conceal anchors.
Stability training to prevent corruption of sealed memory.
tips: Ethically fraught â€” treat as sensitive skill.
Works best on short, well-defined memories (faces, phrases).

markdown.text: A sealing jutsu for temporarily preserving a short memory fragment; requires care and discipline.

name: Illumination Lantern
summary: Produces a hovering light source that follows the user and can be dimmed or brightened with thought.
technique: Compress a small pool of yang chakra into a palm-sized orb.
Stabilize the orb with a simple single-seal anchor.
Adjust intensity via subtle breath control.
training: Sustain the light for increasing durations.
Train to keep orb steady in wind or rain (protected casting).
tips: Can be used to signal allies with timed flashes.

markdown.text: A low-cost utility jutsu that creates a controllable floating light.
